FeaturedProduct.details: Designed for solo travelers, this compact yet functional room features a comfortable twin bed with premium hypoallergenic bedding and a dedicated workspace with ergonomic chair. High-speed WiFi (100 Mbps) ensures seamless connectivity for remote work. Blackout curtains and soundproofing create a restful environment. The en-suite bathroom includes a rainfall shower, luxury toiletries, and heated towel rack. Perfect for business travelers or those seeking affordable comfort.

Our most luxurious single accommodation offers a king-size bed with memory foam mattress and dedicated sitting area featuring a designer armchair. Smart room technology allows control of lighting, temperature, and blackout shades via tablet. The spa-like bathroom features heated floors, a rain shower with chromatherapy lighting, and premium organic toiletries. Enjoy nightly turndown service with artisanal chocolates. Pet-friendly with plush pet bed and food bowls provided upon request.

Wake up to panoramic views of our award-winning gardens from your private balcony in this nature-inspired retreat. The room features organic cotton bedding, a live-edge wood desk, and herbal tea station. The bathroom showcases botanical-themed mosaics and eco-friendly toiletries. Yoga mats and guided meditation apps are provided. Enjoy daily fresh flowers from our gardens. The perfect sanctuary for those seeking tranquility and connection with nature.

This urban-chic room offers floor-to-ceiling windows with breathtaking city views and motorized blackout shades. The workstation features a sit-stand desk, multiple USB ports, and noise-canceling panels. A well-stocked minibar includes local craft beverages. The modern bathroom has backlit mirrors and luxury amenities. A digital guidebook with local insider tips is provided. Perfect for business travelers who want to stay connected while enjoying vibrant city energy.

Our sustainable room features furniture crafted from reclaimed wood and walls painted with zero-VOC paint. The organic cotton bedding and hypoallergenic pillows ensure restful sleep. Energy monitoring displays show your environmental impact. Includes reusable water bottle and tote bag. The bathroom has water-saving fixtures and biodegradable toiletries. Guests receive discounts at local green businesses. Housekeeping uses only eco-friendly cleaning products for a truly green stay.

This versatile room offers flexible bedding configurations (two twins or one king) with premium mattresses. The sitting area includes a loveseat and coffee table. Kitchen amenities include mini-fridge, microwave, and coffee maker. The workspace has ample outlets and task lighting. Blackout curtains ensure quality sleep. The bathroom features a spacious vanity and hairdryer. Ideal for couples or business travelers sharing accommodations while maintaining comfort and functionality.

Experience elevated comfort with a king-size canopy bed dressed in luxury linens. The separate sitting area features a velvet sofa and cocktail table. A gourmet coffee station includes local beans and artisanal chocolates. The marble bathroom boasts dual vanities and a deep soaking tub. High-end amenities include a Dyson hairdryer and plush robes. Smart controls adjust lighting, temperature, and blackout shades for ultimate convenience and relaxation.

Designed for business travelers, this room features an expansive workspace with Herman Miller chair, printer/scanner, and video conferencing lighting. The king bed has anti-jetlag bedding technology. Access to executive lounge includes complimentary breakfast and evening cocktails. The bathroom includes steam shower and grooming kit. 24/7 concierge handles business needs. High-speed WiFi supports multiple devices. Perfect for productive stays without sacrificing comfort.

Breathtaking ocean vistas unfold from your private balcony in this romantic retreat. Nautical-themed decor features custom driftwood furniture and subtle wave motifs. Champagne welcome and daily sunset turndown service set the mood. The bathroom offers sea-view soaking tub and marine-inspired toiletries. Smart glass partitions allow privacy control while maintaining views. Direct beach access via private path. Perfect for honeymooners or those seeking a serene coastal escape.

Indulge in romance with this luxurious suite featuring a king-size canopy bed and private in-room jacuzzi with chromotherapy lighting. The sitting area includes velvet loveseat and cocktail station. Mood lighting and curated playlist enhance the ambiance. The spa bathroom features heated floors, dual rain showers, and premium bath salts. Enjoy complimentary champagne and chocolate-dipped strawberries upon arrival. Perfect for anniversaries or special celebrations.

Step back into the glamorous 1920s with this Art Deco-inspired suite featuring geometric patterns, gold accents, and vintage furnishings. The centerpiece is a restored antique record player with selection of jazz vinyls. The cocktail station includes period glassware and recipe book. The black-and-white tiled bathroom features a clawfoot tub. Evening turndown service includes Gatsby-era treats. Pet-friendly with vintage pet bed and bowls.

Ideal for small groups or families, this spacious room offers three twin beds or one king plus one twin configuration. The sitting area includes a sofa and large coffee table. Extra storage space and luggage racks accommodate all belongings. The workspace has multiple outlets for charging devices. Blackout curtains ensure restful sleep for all guests. The bathroom features an extended vanity and magnifying mirror.

This family-friendly room features a king bed and bunk beds with premium mattresses. The kids' corner includes toys, books, and games. Childproofing includes outlet covers and corner guards. The bathroom has step stools and child-size robes. A mini-fridge stores snacks and drinks. Blackout curtains and soundproofing ensure peaceful nights. Ideal for families with children aged 3-12.

This spacious suite features separate living area with sofa bed and kitchenette (microwave, sink, mini-fridge). The bedroom has a king bed with blackout curtains. The dining table seats four comfortably. Includes streaming services and board games. The bathroom has dual access from both areas. Ideal for extended family stays or friends traveling together who want extra space and privacy.

This practical family room features two double beds with hypoallergenic bedding and available crib. The kids' entertainment package includes child-friendly TV channels and streaming. The mini-fridge stores snacks and drinks. Childproofing available upon request. The bathroom has a tub/shower combo and step stool. Located near elevators for easy stroller access. Ideal for budget-conscious families.

Kids will love the themed bunk beds (choose from pirate, space, or castle designs) with reading lights and privacy curtains. The play nook includes toys and books. Parents enjoy a king bed and separate seating area with coffee maker. The bathroom has dual sinks and kid-size toiletries. Evening milk and cookies service available.

Perfect for multi-generational families, these connecting rooms feature one king bedroom and one twin bedroom with shared bathroom. The soundproof divider provides privacy when needed. Includes two TVs, mini-fridge, and microwave. The bathroom has separate tub and shower areas. Extra outlets and charging stations throughout. Located near elevators and ice machines for convenience.

This expansive family room features a king bed for parents and bunk beds for kids, plus a play area with slide and bean bags. The entertainment center includes family movies and video games. The kitchenette has microwave, mini-fridge, and bottle warmer. Evening movie nights with popcorn provided. The bathroom has separate kids' area with step stools and non-slip mats.

This two-room suite offers complete family comfort with parents' king bedroom and kids' room with two twin beds. The living area features sofa bed, dining table, and kitchenette with dishwasher. Includes board games and streaming services. The bathroom has dual vanities and separate tub/shower. Soundproofing ensures peaceful nights. Grocery delivery service available. Ideal for longer family stays.
